facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population below international poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population living below the extreme poverty line was approximately 0.6 % in 2008.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population living below the national poverty line (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of population living below the national poverty line was 26.9 % in 2008.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2013 , Samoa has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Prevalence of undernourishment (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population suffering from hunger was 3.1 % in 2016 .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely stunted (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2014, 4.7 % of children under age 5 had stunted growth

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children moderately or severely overweight (%)
facts.fact_text: The share of overweight children under age 5 was 5.4 % in 2014.

facts.seriesTitle: Maternal mortality ratio
facts.fact_text: The maternal mortality ratio decreased from 156 per 100,000 live births in 1990 to 51 per 100,000 live births in 2015 .

facts.seriesTitle: Under-five mortality rate, by sex (deaths per 1,000 live births)
facts.fact_text: The mortality rate of children under age 5 fell from 21.8 per 1,000 live births in 2000 to 16.5 per 1,000 live births in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Mortality rate attributed to cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease (probability)
facts.fact_text: The risk of dying between the ages of 30 and 70 from one of four main non-communicable diseases (NCDs) - cardiovascular disease, cancer, diabetes or chronic respiratory disease - fell from 29.5 % in 2000 to 20.6% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Participation rate in organized learning (one year before the official primary entry age), by sex (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 36.8974 % of children participated in pre-primary or primary education in the year prior to the official entrance age for primary school

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of women aged 20-24 years who were married or in a union before age 18 (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2014, 10.8 % of women aged 20 to 24 reported that they were married before their eighteenth birthday

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of seats held by women in national parliaments (% of total number of seats)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of seats held by women in single or lower houses of parliament increased from 8.1633 % in 2000 to 10% in 2018.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with access to electricity, by urban/rural (%)
facts.fact_text: The proportion of the population with access to electricity increased from 87.61 % in 2000 to 100.00% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population with primary reliance on clean fuels and technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , 31 % of the population relied primarily on clean fuels and technology.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 3.97141 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 5.26065 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Unemployment rate, by sex and age (%)
facts.fact_text: The total unemployment rate increased from 5.0 % in 2001 to 14.5% in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Annual growth rate of real GDP per capita (%)
facts.fact_text: The annual growth rate of real gross domestic product (GDP) per capita was -1.06 % in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of population covered by a mobile network, by technology (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2017, 97.00 % of the population was in range of at least a second-generation (2G) cellular signal

facts.seriesTitle: Annual mean levels of fine particulate matter in cities, urban population (micrograms per cubic meter)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the annual population-weighted average mean concentration of fine suspended particles of less than 2.5 microns in diameters (PM2.5) was about 10.5566577911377 micrograms per cubic metre . This is above the maximum level for safety set by WHO of 10 micrograms per cubic metre.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2013 , Samoa has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Domestic material consumption per capita, by type of raw material (tonnes)
facts.fact_text: Domestic material consumption increased from 3.97141 metric tons per capita in 2000 to 5.26065 metric tons per capita in 2017.

facts.seriesTitle: Countries with legislative and/or regulatory provisions been made for managing disaster risk (1 = YES; 0 = NO)
facts.fact_text: As of 2013 , Samoa has developed national and local disaster reduction strategies.

facts.seriesTitle: Coverage of protected areas in relation to marine areas (Exclusive Economic Zones) (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2018 , 0.0868 % of the marine environment under national jurisdiction (up to 200 nautical miles from shore) was under protection.

facts.seriesTitle: Forest area as a proportion of total land area (%)
facts.fact_text: Land area covered by forest was 60.42403 % in 2015.

facts.seriesTitle: Average proportion of Terrestrial Key Biodiversity Areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas (%)
facts.fact_text: The average proportion of terrestrial key biodiversity areas (KBAs) covered by protected areas was 37.08219 % in 2018 .

facts.seriesTitle: Number of victims of intentional homicide per 100,000 population, by sex (victims per 100,000 population)
facts.fact_text: In 2013 , the intentional homicide rate was 3.15 per 100,000 population .

facts.seriesTitle: Proportion of children under 5 years of age whose births have been registered with a civil authority (% of children under 5 years of age)
facts.fact_text: In 2014 , there were about 58.6 % of children under age 5 whose births were registered with a civil authority

facts.seriesTitle: Volume of remittances (in United States dollars) as a proportion of total GDP (%)
facts.fact_text: In 2016 , the inflow of personal remittances was 4.87 % of GDP , down from 34.19 % in 1990

facts.seriesTitle: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services (%)
facts.fact_text: Debt service as a proportion of exports of goods and services declined from 10.62 % in 1990 to 8.73% in 2016.

facts.seriesTitle: Fixed Internet broadband subscriptions per 100 inhabitants, by speed (per 100 inhabitants)
facts.fact_text: In 2017 , fixed-broadband internet penetration reached 0.86 % of the population , up from 0.02% of the population in 2004 .
